title: My Wife Came From A Thousand Years Ago - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Age Progression   Ancient China   Apartment Life   Beautiful Female Lead   Bickering Couple   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Cohabitation   Couple Growth   Death of Loved Ones   Easy Going Life   Fated Lovers   Helpful Protagonist   Language Barrier   Late Romance   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Mature Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Mysterious Past   Pets   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Tomboyish Female Lead
author: 花还没开
description:
'I want to go home.'

'You may not be able to go back.'

'Why?'

'Because it's a long way to your house.'

'How far is it?'

'About twelve hundred years away,' Xu Qing directed a sympathetic gaze towards the young girl who hailed from the Tang Dynasty, 'Everything you knew has become history.'

Family, friends, and enemies— all silenced twelve hundred years ago...>
